message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic, strategic, and fair. I've formed genuine connections while making tough decisions based on gameplay rather than personal vendettas. 

P5 has played well, but I've consistently balanced building relationships with making strategic moves that benefited multiple players. I've survived elimination rounds by adapting my approach and maintaining trust.

I would be honored to have your vote as someone who played with integrity while still embracing the competitive nature of the game. Thank you all for the journey we've shared.

To the jury: I've played this game with integrity, strategy, and respect for each of you. I built bridges, adapted when needed, and made tough choices without losing sight of the bigger picture. If you value consistency, loyalty, and thoughtful gameplay, I ask for your vote. P3 played hard, but I believe my path was more balanced and less opportunistic. I hope to earn your respect—and your vote—as the rightful winner. Thank you.
